pr_title: HBASE-24759 Refuse to update configuration of default group

timeline.message: HBASE-24759 Persisting configuration of default rsgroup

timeline.bodyText: Why change this? getDefaultServers not used any more?
timeline.author: infraio

replies.bodyText: getDefaultServers is still used in behind. This is just for version compatibility, not sure whether groupList has a default group or not after this patch.
replies.author: ddupg

timeline.bodyText: I didn't follow this. DEFAULT_GROUP don't need this?
timeline.author: infraio

replies.bodyText: Yean, after HBASE-22820, we do not persist default group any more. So in this patch, just persist the configuration of default group. As for servers of default group, it is set while refresh().
replies.author: ddupg
